00386 void 
00387 PacketContainer::setResendTimeout(uint32 newResend) {
00388    if ( newResend > minResendTimeout )
00389       m_resendTimeoutSequence = newResend;
00390    else 
00391       m_resendTimeoutSequence = minResendTimeout;
00392 }
